title: The Wishing Tree
description: Winner of the 2002 ERA Award for Best Historical Romance! 3rd Place in the 2002 Laurel Wreath Award! 2002 EPPIE Award Finalist! Jake Tanner goes to collect on a debt and comes back with a bride he doesn't want and can't resist. Grace Marshall is determined to honor her marriage vows, but one step forward with Jake always leads to two steps back. When Jake's past shows up on the doorstep in the form of a wife he thought was dead, Grace has had enough. Now Jake has to figure out how to keep the wife he wants and shed himself of the wife he doesn't want. And one of those wives wants him dead.
author: Catherine Snodgrass
